# R basics

In this chapter we will introduce to the R basics and some exercises to get familiar to how R works.

## Simple things






::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
1+1
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
[1] 2
```


:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
c(1, 2, 3)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
[1] 1 2 3
```


:::

```{.r .cell-code}
c(1:3)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
[1] 1 2 3
```


:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
a = data.frame(
  var1 = c(1:3),
  var2 = c("alpha", "beta", "gama")
)
a
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
  var1  var2
1    1 alpha
2    2  beta
3    3  gama
```


:::

```{.r .cell-code}
View(a)
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
b = c(1:3, 50:100)
b
summary(b)
```
:::
